scripts.prisma:lint: npx -y onchange '**/*.prisma' --exclude-path '.changeignore' -- yarn exec prisma format
scripts.prisma:gen: npx -y onchange '**/*.prisma' --exclude-path '.changeignore' -- yarn exec prisma generate
scripts.prisma:watch: npx -y concurrently -n 'PRISMIX,LINT,GENERATE' -c 'bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold' 'yarn run prisma:mix' 'yarn run prisma:lint' 'yarn run prisma:gen'
scripts.lint:watch: npx -y onchange '**/*' --exclude-path '.changeignore' -- yarn exec next lint
scripts.dev:watch: npx -y concurrently --exclude-path .changeignore -n 'NEXT,ESLINT,PRETTIER' -c 'bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold' 'yarn run dev' 'yarn run lint:watch ' 'yarn run format:watch'
